email.subject: Diary
email.body:
Fuck, fuck, fuck I lost him!
At least I saved Calra Maybe that is even more important
But I can lose Omicron as well I need help
I really hope that Clara will be grateful for my actions And will help me too I just saved her after all...
We need to destroy Omicron somehow Maybe he left some tracks on Clara's network
I need to reset her channel if I want to contact her through it Just have to delete active.log in /IRC folder That will attract her attention And activate the channel
